description.narrative: Funding under this investment supports the Educational Quality and Assessment Program (EQAP) in the Pacific. EQAP provides services in curriculum design and assessment, teacher accountability, and education systems policy, for the Pacific Islands and Territories (PICT) Members of the Pacific Community. EQAPs mission is to Enhance the quality of education and training for Pacific learners to realise the benefits of lifelong learning. The expected outcomes include: 1) Improved literacy, numeracy and like skills nationally and regionally; 2) Increase PICTs education assessment systems; 3) Improved PICTS education systems; 4) Established regional system that facilitates international recognition of Pacific qualifications; and 5) Strengthen EQAP capacity to support education systems efforts to improve the quality of education. The total estimated value of this investment is $15.5 million over 6 years, starting 2017-18.
